Description: Redware pottery jar with a rounded base and body and an everted rim(chipped), decorated with a red slip.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 221)
Rzeuska 2017 / Chronological Overview of Pottery from Asyut (192-193) (Catalogue number 89)
